titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Phosphor YOX, yttrium oxide phosphor, activated by europium.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/24/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Phosphor YOX, yttrium oxide phosphor, activated by europium.
